get.description: Redirects to facebook page. Access to email and birthday is required. Then redirects back to application and sign in.

400.description: Login failed, user didn't want to give access.

get.description: Exchange a Facebook oauth token for a Cizo oauth token

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Facebook token must give access to user's email and birthday. Can be generated <a href = 'here'>https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer?method=GET&path=me%3Ffields%3Did%2Cname%2Cbirthday%2Cemail&version=v2.5<a>

400.description: Bad request. This is returned if access_token is invalid or expired
Bad request. This is returned if grant_type is anything other than "password" or "refresh_token"

401.description: Unauthorized. This is returned if wrong credentials or invalid refresh_token or invalid scope(anything but the "admin" or "user") have been sent

422.description: Unprocessable untity. This is returned if username is blank

get.description: Returns a category for the given ID.

put.description: Updates a category. Title must be unique.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

409.description: Error occurring when a Category with that title already exists

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

post.description: Creates a category. Title must be unique

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

409.description: Error occurring when a Category with that title already exists

get.description: Searches using the specfied parameter and returns a list of matching videos.
Returns a list of featured videos

204.description: Video has been marked as featured

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"
Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

get.description: Returns a list of trending videos
Returns a list of all users.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"
Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

get.description: Returns a user for the given ID.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

post.description: Sends email with reset password instructions

200.description: Email with reset password instructions has been sent.

put.description: Marks a video as seen for guest users

204.description: Video has been marked as seen.

get.description: Gets a list of videos skipped by the current user

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date before the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date after the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to try and retrieve up to a maximum of 200.

put.description: Marks a list of videos as skipped.

202.description: Videos have been accepted for processing. Processing happens in the background. GET /users/me/videos/skipped should be used to validate success.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

204.description: Video has been marked as skipped

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

get.description: Gets a list of videos unseen by the current user

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date before the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date after the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to try and retrieve up to a maximum of 200.

put.description: Marks a video as skipped for guest users

204.description: Video has been marked as seen.

delete.description: Deletes the current user. All oauth2 tokens for the user will be revoked

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

204.description: Video has been marked as liked

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

delete.description: Removes a like on a video.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

200.description: Email with reset password instructions has been sent.

get.description: Gets a list of videos liked by the current user

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date before the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date after the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to try and retrieve up to a maximum of 200.

put.description: Marks a list of videos as liked.

202.description: Videos have been accepted for processing. Processing happens in the background. GET /users/me/videos/liked should be used to validate success.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

get.description: Gets a list of videos seen by the current user

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date before the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date after the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to try and retrieve up to a maximum of 200.

put.description: Marks a list of videos as seen. The video's skipped parameter will be set to false and removed from the skipped resource if present.

202.description: Videos have been accepted for processing. Processing happens in the background. GET /users/me/videos/seen should be used to validate success.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

put.description: Marks a video as seen. The video's skipped parameter will be set to false and removed from the skipped resource if present.

204.description: Video has been marked as seen.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "user"

get.description: This endpoint redirects to the location of the stream. Prior to redirecting, it validates that the user meets the age requirements for streaming a video and increases the view count of a video.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the user is unauthenticated and mature_content is true or mature_content is true and the user is less than 18 years old.

get.description: This endpoint returns the S3 upload details for client side uploading of a raw stream video for transcoding. See <a href='http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/UsingHTTPPOST.html'>AWS's browser based upload documentation</a> for more details.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename of file to be uploaded. Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and periods (.). Must start and end with a letter or number. Max length of 25.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

post.description: Handles a transcode notification. This includes update the status of the stream for which the notification is for. See <a href='http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elastictranscoder/latest/developerguide/notifications.html'>Elastic Transcoder's SNS documentation</a> for POST body.

202.description: Image has been created or updated

post.description: Creates or updates a set of video streams and initiates transcoding for those stream. <b>NOTE</b> The video specified by the 'raw_video_key' must be present in S3. Usually, this matches the 'key' returned by */videos/{video-id}/stream_transcode_request*. <b>NOTE</b> If stream of the specified type already exists, the stream's status must be either 'completed', 'canceled', or 'error' for the update to succeed

202.description: Stream has been accepted for transcoding

400.description: Error occurring when the key specified does not exist in S3

409.description: Error occuring when a stream of that type for that video is in a 'pending' state

get.description: Returns a list of videos ordered by created_at. At most 200 videos will be returned. For an oauth2 scope of 'admin', this includes all videos. For oauth2 scope of 'user' or unauthenticated clients, this includes only videos with 'visible' set to true. <b>NOTE</b>  If the user is unauthenticated and mature_content is true or mature_content is true and the user is less than 18 years old, streams will be null.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filters videos by tags. Comma separated list of tags.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date before the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filters videos by created_at date. Videos that have a date after the one specified will be returned.

parameters.name: visible
parameters.description: Filter videos by 'visible' field. If client is unauthenticated or has a token with a scope of 'user', the videos returned will only contain the "id" attribute of each video if this query parameter is set to false.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Filter videos that have been deleted. The videos returned will only contain the "id" attribute of each video.

parameters.name: show_mature_content
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether videos containing mature content should appear in the return. Default value is true.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to try and retrieve, up to a maximum of 200.

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum video id to include in the return. Exclusive.

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Specifies the minimum video id to include in the return. Exclusive.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

post.description: Creates or updates the hero image for a video. This is a multipart/form-data POST.

202.description: Image has been created or updated

get.description: Returns a video for the given ID. If the user is unauthenticated and mature_content is true or mature_content is true and the user is less than 18 years old, streams will be null.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the client is unauthenticated or has a 'user' scope and the video's visible property is not set to true

put.description: Updates a video. The 'streams' and 'hero_image_link' properties are ignored.

403.description: Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"
Forbidden. This is returned if the oauth2 scope is anything other than "admin"

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific video

subtitle.description: Subtitle of video. Max length of 255

description_title.description: Title of video description. Max length of 255

mature_content.description: Boolean indicating if the video contains mature content

visible.description: Whether a video is visible. This property is only visible to clients with an oauth2 scope of 'admin'

tag_list.description: Comma seperated list of tags associated with video.

hero_image_upload_status.description: Hero image up. This property is only visible to clients with an oauth2 scope of 'admin'

liked.description: Boolean representing whether the current user has liked the video. This property is not present for unauthenticated clients.

seen.description: Boolean representing whether the current user has seen the video. This property is not present for unauthenticated clients.

skipped.description: Boolean representing whether the current user has skipped the video. This property is not present for unauthenticated clients.

view_count.description: View count. NOTE This only visible if oauth2 scope is "admin".

skip_count.description: View count. NOTE This only visible if oauth2 scope is "admin".

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific category

canonical_title.description: Canonical title of category. This field is suitable for matching on a specific category. For example, if a client wants to find the "Movies" category, the client should look for a category with a canonical_title of "movies". This field is computed when creating or updating a category.

transcode_status.description: Transcode status. This property is only visible to oauth2 scope of "admin"

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific video

password.description: Password of user. This is omitted from any endpoint returns

password_confirmation.description: Password of user. This is omitted from any endpoint returns

birthday.description: Birthday of user. ISO-8061 date-time. Timezone is UTC

featured_order.description: Order at which the video should appear within the featured list. If omitted, video will be appended to list.

refresh_token.description: Uniq refresh_token, can be used when access_token expires.

grant_type.description: grant type, can be password or refresh_token

username.description: User's email. Required if grant_type is password.

password.description: User's password. Required if grant_type is password.

scope.description: Authorization scope. Can be sent if grant_type is password.

refresh_token.description: User's refresh token. Required if grant_type is refresh_token.
Uniq refresh_token, can be used when access_token expires.

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific video
Unique identifier representing a specific video
Unique identifier representing a specific video

email.description: Unique identifier representing a specific video

subtitle.description: Subtitle of video. Max length of 255

description_title.description: Title of video description. Max length of 255

mature_content.description: Boolean indicating if the video contains mature content

tag_list.description: Comma seperated list of tags associated with video.

mature_content.description: Boolean indicating if the video contains mature content

tag_list.description: Comma seperated list of tags associated with video.

subtitle.description: Subtitle of video. Max length of 255

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific video

description_title.description: Title of video description. Max length of 255

key.description: S3 bucket key for raw video.
Upload key. S3 bucket key to store uploaded video in
